events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The case was categorized under refund after reviewing the customer's request for money back due to sizing.
Assigned the refund case to agent Lisa Smith to handle the customer query regarding the return process.
Hello, this is Lisa from customer support. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return to proceed with your refund request?
Sure, my order number is 789654. The jacket feels too tight around the shoulders and is uncomfortable.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the pre-paid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help, I appreciate the easy return process and the prepaid label.
The refund case was marked as resolved after sending the return label and confirming the refund process with the customer.
We are checking in to confirm you have successfully returned the jacket and if the refund process met your expectations.
The case was formally closed after confirmation of refund issued and customer satisfaction with the resolution.
